game.name: Granser - Act 1
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A story driven rpg inspired by JRPGS, featuring a unique turn based battle system. Follow Saragat and his dubious allies as they untangle the web of lies and attempt to dismantle the shadowy conspiracy of "The Core", as a far greater threat will reawaken.
